00048 void PluginLoader::load(Symbol const &name) {
00049   handle_map::iterator i = m_loaded.find(name);
00050   if( m_loaded.end()==i ) {
00051     bool found;
00052     std::string fileName = m_log->locate("lib"+name.str()+p_dlext(), found);
00053     if( found ) {
00054       void *handle = p_dlopen(fileName.c_str(), RTLD_NOW);
00055       if( NULL==handle )
00056         throw PluginError(name, "Failed to load \""+name.str()+"\"");
00057       plugin_fn f_init = (plugin_fn)p_dlsym(handle, "initPlugin");
00058       if( NULL==f_init ) {
00059         PluginError err(name, "missing initPugin");
00060         p_dlclose(handle);
00061         throw err;
00062       }
00063       m_loaded[name] = std::make_pair(handle, 1);
00064       // call to f_init : may throw an exception but
00065       //                  it is too be avoided
00066       f_init();
00067     } else 
00068       throw Exception("Unable to locate plugin "+name.str());
00069   } else {
00070     i->second.second += 1;
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool PluginLoader::unload(Symbol const &name) {
00075   handle_map::iterator i = m_loaded.find(name);
00076   if( m_loaded.end()!=i ) {
00077     if( (i->second.second--)<=1 ) {
00078       void *handle = i->second.first;
00079       if( 0!=p_dlclose(handle) )
00080         throw PluginError(i->first, "Failed to unload");
00081       m_loaded.erase(i);
00082       return true;
00083     }
00084   }
00085   return false;
00086 }
